headline: What Do Recent Cash Flow Projections Mean for Norwegian Cruise Line in 2025?
summary: If you find yourself on the fence about Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings stock, you are not alone. Figuring out whether to hold, buy, or wait on the sidelines has never felt more interesting than right now. In the last year, the share price sailed up 20.8%, brushing off spells of volatility, but the journey has hardly been a straight line. There was a pullback over the past week, down 5.3%, but look further back and you will see steady progress, with 5.8% gained over the last month and a...
